Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Yeng Keng Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Penang, steps from Camera Museum and minutes from Cheong Fatt Tze Mansion. This historic hotel is within close proximity of Penang Islamic Museum and Kapitan Keling Mosque.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 20 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and slippers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, limo/town car service, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Penang? This hotel has facilities measuring 75 square feet (7 square meters), including meeting rooms. Extended parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar. Dining is also available at a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Yeng Keng Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Penang, steps from Camera Museum and minutes from Cheong Fatt Tze Mansion. This historic hotel is within close proximity of Penang Islamic Museum and Kapitan Keling Mosque.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Camera Museum - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Cheong Fatt Tze Mansion - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Penang Islamic Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Kapitan Keling Mosque - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Cathedral of the Assumption - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Studio Howard - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Penang State Museum - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Kuan Yin Teng - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Goddess of Mercy Temple - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Sri Mariamman Temple - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Han Jiang Ancestral Temple - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Choo Chay Keong Temple - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Queen Street - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Hock Teik Cheng Sin Temple - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Cannon Street - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Yeng Keng Hotel is Penang (PEN-Penang Intl.) - 16.1 km / 10 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
